rows.label: qst200715_msg0001
rows.name:
Ugh, it's no use...
There's a lock on this thing...

rows.label: qst200715_msg0004
rows.name: And it's quite an intricate one.

rows.label: qst200715_msg0005
rows.name: I don't think we'll be able to open it.

rows.label: qst200715_msg0006
rows.name:
Does that mean I can't eat
the Bloomshroom?!

rows.label: qst200715_msg0007
rows.name: Leave it to Yumyum!

rows.label: qst200715_msg0008
rows.name: You think you can do it?

rows.label: qst200715_msg0009
rows.name: Hehehehe...

rows.label: qst200715_msg0010
rows.name:
Yumyum is a first-rate burglar...
The lock has not yet been built
which would thwart me!

rows.label: qst200715_msg0011
rows.name: Show me that.

rows.label: qst200715_msg0012
rows.name: Hmhmhm, I see, I see...

rows.label: qst200715_msg0013
rows.name: Can you open it?

rows.label: qst200715_msg0014
rows.name: Patience, patience...

rows.label: qst200715_msg0015
rows.name:
When you think about it, doesn't this
look more and more like a group effort?
Division of labor, so to speak!

rows.label: qst200715_msg0016
rows.name:
Idaten cleared the path, and now
Yumyum the Burglar opens the lock...

rows.label: qst200715_msg0017
rows.name:
It is because we joined forces that we
were able to attain this great treasure!

rows.label: qst200715_msg0018
rows.name:
Two great heroes, beloved of Nopon
and children, working arm in arm...
What a glorious development!

rows.label: qst200715_msg0019
rows.name:
Yeah, yeah. When do we eat
the Bloomshroom, though?

rows.label: qst200715_msg0020
rows.name:
...Bah.
Listening clearly isn't his strong suit...

rows.label: qst200715_msg0021
rows.name:
You only just realized?
You two've been talking across each
other since this whole thing started...

rows.label: qst200715_msg0022
rows.name:
I know, I know, but...
Grrr, it just irks me that my greatest
rival has to be such a thick oaf.

rows.label: qst200715_msg0023
rows.name:
After we grab the Bloomshroom,
we gotta hurry back to the Harapekko
Canteen!

rows.label: qst200715_msg0024
rows.name:
There they'll know how best to
cook it up!

rows.label: qst200715_msg0025
rows.name: He really doesn't listen, does he...?

rows.label: qst200715_msg0026
rows.name: Yumyum, hurry up and open it already!

rows.label: qst200715_msg0027
rows.name: Nearly there...

rows.label: qst200715_msg0028
rows.name:
And voil√†! The lock is open!
Go on, take a gander inside!
